string.value: #b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he's identified the emblem. Let's go see what he's discovered.

He says the emblem signifies #rMarbas#k, who is known for spreading diseases. He was sealed in #bEllinia#k, but someone has broken the seal.

First things first, though. He says you he needs a lot of Trees to stop the virus from spreading.
He says to hunt #rDark Stumps#k and #rAxe Stumps#k.
(He says they can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)

Return to #b#@1022000:##k in Perion upon completion.
The emblem signified #rMarbas#k the demon; the virus was stopped by blocking the Water Pipe with the Trees.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,500 Able to proceed to 'Returning to Ellinia' as next quest.

According to the ancient book, this emblem signifies #rMarbas#k, a demon who was sealed in #bEllinia#k. He is a malicious figure that takes joy in transmitting deadly diseases. You can assume that he is responsible for all diseases that were recently found in Victoria Island.
Now, since we've figured out who was responsible, we must stop the virus from spreading. Won't you help me?
The virus is spreading through the water, so we must block the Water Pipe. There is only one way to block the Water Pipe, and that's by using a lot of Trees.
Hunt 30 #rDark Stumps#k and 30 #rAxe Stumps#k. You'll be able to collect enough wood then.\nThey can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.
This is urgent. Let me know as soon as you're ready.
That's wonderful. We can block the waterway, thanks to all the wood you've collected. I'm sure this will stop the virus from spreading through the water.
Thanks to you, we were able to prevent the virus from spreading. I want to sincerely thank you once again.
